17 tweets about girls that clearly weren’t worth it
A well-known aphorism reads: “A screaming man is ridiculous in anger, and a silent man is scary.” However, in the case of girls, you won’t immediately understand what is better: when they are silent and angry or when they do not restrain their emotions. It seems that neither one nor the other option does not bode well for the guilty.
